scripts.create:lambda: yarn build & aws lambda create-function --profile flowergeoji-fg --function-name LambdaFunctionTest --zip-file fileb://function.zip --handler index.handler --runtime nodejs12.x --role arn:aws:iam::820263786735:role/lambda-apigateway-test-role
scripts.update:lambda: yarn build & aws lambda update-function-code --profile flowergeoji-fg --function-name LambdaFunctionTest --zip-file fileb://function.zip
